text: Allur is a village in Kothapatnam mandal, located in Prakasam district of Andhra Pradesh, India. ==Etymology== To distinguish it from other Allur, when both villages were in same Nellore district before Ongole district was created, it was called as Akula Allur or Allur with leaves and its namesake was called as Pantala Allur or Allur with staple. == Geography == Allur is located at . It is about 16 km from Ongole. Vijayawada Airport is the nearest airport; Ongole is the nearest railhead. == References == Category:Villages in Prakasam district
title: Allur, Prakasam district
